TopicTitle: How do i turn on perma-death ingame?

Articles.Content:
I cant find an option for it anywhere.

Edited January 7, 2014 by Requiem762
It's in the persistence.sfs (?) file for your save game, along with all sorts of other options. It's something like LostCrewsRegenerate, you set it to 'false'.

If you really want a challenge you can get TAC life support which requires your crew to consume Food, water, oxygen, and electricity or they die. You can also easily turn on Permadeath.

Alternatively, in your persistent.sfs there is the line 

MissingCrewsRespawn = True

change True to False and your crew will never come back!
